lender.name: Sherri Howe
lender.loan_because:
Many intelligent and hardworking people do not succeed because they lack the necessary resources. Kiva provides an easy way for anyone and everyone in the world to help someone else succeed. It's also easy for anyone to donate, whatever their financial resources.
Once I heard about Kiva, it wasn't even a question of whether or not I would loan. The hardest decision was to who. I will be donating a percentage of each of my future sales to Kiva.
I feel very strongly that everyone should find a way to help those less fortunate (and their are always less fortunate people), whether it is donating our time, our money, our voices. This is a great way for me to quickly & easily spread my reach. :)
lender.occupational_info: My passion is helping people to achieve the dream of homeownership. As a real estate agent, I help people through the very complicated San Francisco real estate transaction, making sure they are protected and finding them the best home possible based on their budget and interests. When not working, I'm leading Habitat for Humanity trips worldwide, and building houses one brick at a time.

lender.name: Becky
lender.loan_because:
Years ago I sponsored women in Africa and Europe who were victims of civil wars and were left to support several orphaned children; in one case, 11 orphans.
These women had no job skills, no way to earn a living yet they took in orphans. Seeing how much those women could accomplish with money we in the U.S. would think nothing of spending on a dinner out was amazing.
These women realized that education was the key to a better life and while they asked nothing for themselves, their dream was to make enough money to send their children to school. One of my most treasured possessions is a photo of 11 orphans dressed in school uniforms on their first day of school in Zaire.
So much can be accomplished, given a little help, by those who are willing to work toward a better future.
